Structs/EVConstants.html#/s:22EVSlidingT.name: evTableViewCell
Structs/EVConstants.html#/s:22EVSlidingT.abstract: UINib of the TableViewCell used by the Cocoapod library

Structs/DrawerViewOption.html#/s:22EVSli.name: init(labelText:actionText:icon:action:)
Structs/DrawerViewOption.html#/s:22EVSli.abstract: Set UIAttributes for DrawerView, establish gesture recognizers, and add the user defined overlay to the drawer.

Structs/DrawerViewOption.html.name: DrawerViewOption
Structs/DrawerViewOption.html.abstract: Contains the settings used to create a Drawer View Button inside of the drawer view, when the overlay is swiped the drawer view is revealed and is populated based on the values contained here

Protocols/UIViewLoading.html#/s:22EVSlid.name: loadFromNib(_:)
Protocols/UIViewLoading.html#/s:22EVSlid.abstract: Function that allows for a UIView to be loaded from a nib call YourView.loadFromNib(yourBundle)

Protocols/SlidingTableViewCellDelegate.h.name: didSelectRowIn(_:atIndexPath:)
Protocols/SlidingTableViewCellDelegate.h.abstract: Resets Overlay view to center position when the TableViewCell is selected. You can call this method from didSelectRowAtIndexPath, or you can override.

Protocols/SlidingTableViewCellDelegate.h.name: SlidingTableViewCellDelegate
Protocols/SlidingTableViewCellDelegate.h.abstract: The delegate of a SlidingTableViewCell must adopt the SlidingTableViewCellDelegate protocol. Methods of this protocol allow the delegate to handle selections and manage the UIButton IBAction’s associated with the drawer view.

Protocols/UIViewLoading.html.name: UIViewLoading
Protocols/UIViewLoading.html.abstract: Extension on UIView that allows for the easy loading of a UIView from a Nib. Simply call your UIView and provide a NSBundle, nil is acceptable

Classes/EVOverlayView.html#/s:22EVSlidin.name: OverlayType
Classes/EVOverlayView.html#/s:22EVSlidin.abstract: Dictionary of parameters [String:Any?] that the user should access inside the setupUI() method in order to set the layout for their cell

Classes/EVOverlayView.html#/s:22EVSlidin.name: parameters
Classes/EVOverlayView.html#/s:22EVSlidin.abstract: Stored property that updates the viewParameters and calls the setupUI() method

Classes/EVOverlayView.html#/s:22EVSlidin.name: setupUI()
Classes/EVOverlayView.html#/s:22EVSlidin.abstract: Method user should override in order to allow for a dynamic cell layout

Classes/SlidingTableViewControllerCell.h.name: setCellWith(overlayParameters:drawerViewOptions:overlayView:)
Classes/SlidingTableViewControllerCell.h.abstract: Set UIAttributes for DrawerView, establish gesture recognizers, and add the user defined overlay to the drawer.

Classes/SlidingTableViewControllerCell.h.name: clear()
Classes/SlidingTableViewControllerCell.h.abstract: Removes overlay from the superview including gestures

Classes/SlidingTableViewControllerCell.h.name: resetOverlay(animated:)
Classes/SlidingTableViewControllerCell.h.abstract: Sets overlay to original center position, fully covering the drawer view.

Classes/SlidingTableViewControllerCell.h.name: gestureRecognizerShouldBegin(_:)
Classes/SlidingTableViewControllerCell.h.abstract: Set gesture recognizer to only pick up on horizontal swipes and allow for normal vertical scrolling of the UITableView

Classes/EVOverlayView.html.name: EVOverlayView
Classes/EVOverlayView.html.abstract: Base class for the view that overlay’s the drawer view. User’s should extend this class and create their own Overlay view’s.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
